reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: First trip to Bangkok and I'm so glad I stayed here. Great hotel with super helpful staff! Akiko in guest services was fantastic and helped with all requests with ease! Rooms are huge and impeccable, as were the bathrooms. We stayed in a club room which gave us 24hr access to the club lounge which included snacks and meals all delicious! Wouldn't stay anywhere else!
reviews.title: Fantastic Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Had a lovely stay at the Banyan Tree...beautiful hotel...breakfast was excellent as was staff...had a nice meal in the vertigo restaurant ...what a brilliant view...and the staff very attentive ... Sat in the swimming pool area which is small but very nice ...overall enjoyed our stay there
reviews.title: Lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: i visited banyan tree in my summer vacation and it was just awesome as i seen it in one movie.from the day i saw this hotel in movie i wanted to visit it personally and actually i got chance.the hotel is located at a very great place.the climate of thailand is pretty much exciting.you will get great services here and everything is authentic.please visit it once.
reviews.title: worth every penny
Excellent start to out honeymoon
reviews.text: We stayed on the 57th floor in a lovely suite for two nights at the banyan tree. Firstly the I have to mention the view - wow!!! Anyway the service was excellent as you would expect and the breakfast tasty!! We had dinner on the vertigo restaurant on the 59th which is pretty special although my wife found it pretty scary - if you don't like heights this might not be for you :-) food was excellent but beware it is expensive I paid about £60 for my steak.

reviews.title: Nice hotelrooms but overrated
reviews.text: Room was well appointed and beds super comfortable :-) all in all highly recommended but if your flying in from the uk have 3 nights to allow you to waste some time getting over the flight - we only had 2 and inadvertently slept one day in an instant crash!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled solo
reviews.text: I had a great 2 night stay at the Banyan Tree. I arrived at the hotel at midday, great welcome by the Bellboys and greeted with a flower garland and a nice welcome drink. Prior to arriving I asked their reservations team for a room on a high floor with a city view which was duly received. I only waited about 15 minutes before I was whisked up to room 4302 on the 43rd floor which had the most amazing fantastic views. When entering the room the fruit looked like it had been there for a few days and the welcome letter on the desk was dated from the day before... only minor things which were soon rectified.
reviews.title: Great stay at the Banyan Tree

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Nice LCD TVs, comfortable beds, hot powerful shower, nice bathroom amenities, free drinking water... one annoyance was that there were no plug sockets next to the bed to recharge your phone!?
reviews.title: Could have been better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I didn't really use many of the hotel facilities other than the pool and and Moon Bar. The pool was great but I was shocked how cold the water was... along with a couple of other people which were bravely trying to enter the water! The Moon Bar was fantastic, amazing views, drinks were reasonably priced, service was quick and efficient and loved the free snacks with the drinks ... overall I preferred it much more than the Sky Bar at the Lebua.
reviews.title: It didn't disappoint!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I ordered room service one evening whilst relaxing watching a movie, Tuna Niciose and the Wagyu Beef Burger which were fantastic and great professional service was extended by the IRD gentleman (One minor complaint was the accompanying bread was quite stale, being a little picky I know)
reviews.title: Fabulous
Great hotel
reviews.text: HK Service was great and turn down was done each evening with free turn down amenities left on the bed.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights recently. The ambiance was serene and relaxing. The service was very good. We had a club suite room. A staff member at the fitness centre was very helpful and "spotted" me whilst I did weights and assisted with machines I didn't understand.
reviews.title: An Oasis in the Centre of Bangkok

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a short 3 night stop over in Bangkok. Very pleased to have selected the Banyan Tree. We were upgraded immediately on arrival to a Club Room - King bed. Service was absolutely amazing, dining options extensive. We elected to utilise Vertigo, a must do with the most amazing views of Bangkok.
reviews.title: Bangkok Beauty

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Fantastic hotel and staff, we stayed in club king room, well worth it. The club king room comes with a private lounge, where you get free drinks and free nibbles. Great place to relax.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Next time i'm in Bangkok i will definitely be back.
reviews.title: High End Business Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in the executive club for a couple nights and was very impressed.
reviews.title: Stop over on our way to Australia

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: wonderful hotel stayed on 58th floor; great layout, lots of space. roof bar outstanding view
reviews.title: chic hotel and great service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: service outstanding-- makes experience perfect. close to metro
reviews.title: A gem in the busy district

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled solo
reviews.text: easy to grab cab to hotel from aiport which is cheaper than the hotel car
reviews.title: An excellent hotel - great weekend treat!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: would stay again
reviews.title: Fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: While Sathorn road is not the best for traffic especially during the peak hours, the hotel's proximity (10 mins) walk to the nearest subway station helps. Stayed 2 nights for business, service is excellent and enthusiastic - right from the beginning starting from the airport-hotel pick up, the driver, doorman, bell hop, concierge, check-in officer and F&B staff...all demonstrated extreme warmth and the hospitality befitting a foreign guest. It's great when staff care about their jobs and do with with exuberance, the Banyan tree has done well there. I had a lovely spacious room, and given great comfort I didn't find anything lacking. Breakfast is very good, not an extensive spread but more than adequate especially for the Asian guests. I noticed a lot of tourists groups in the hotel (Taiwanese, mainlanders, etc) which makes the lobby and dining areas really noisy at times but otherwise nothing too much to complain about.
reviews.title: A gem of tranquility in the heart of Bangkok.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just spent 3 nights here for our little getaway (we are local in Bangkok).
reviews.title: Good choice for sathorn area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: The room is spacious with free internet. We got a room facing river which is very good but the sun can be very strong in the morning.
reviews.title: Impeccable Manners

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staffs are generally nice except the staffs in Vertigo which we found very poor service.
reviews.title: Didn't stay here but were treated VERY well

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel offer free shuttle to BTS/MRT on hourly basis. The hotel is pretty much in the middle between MRT and BTS so it will be quite awalk (closer to MRT).
reviews.title: What a fantastic place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I strongly suggest the dinner cruise, it is a must go. We are really disappointed with the service at Vertigo comparing to service we received at the hotel Japanese restaurant.
reviews.title: Excellent Accommodation and Service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: This hotel is truly top of its class in every aspect. It was pure heaven during my stay there. I simply can't think of any other hotel that can come close to it in Bangkok!The food, staff & rooms are all top notch and especially the 2 bedroom suite I stayed, reasonably priced & luxurious at the same time. What more could you ask for?
reviews.title: A Perfect Holiday Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: This is the second time that I have stayed there in 4 weeks and whilst I thought my first visit was perfect, my second was brilliant. The one thing you need to understand about this hotel and what it represents...is the art of service! Every area that I experienced was exceptional and I think to be honest I utilised most areas. The highlights are too many to mention....seriously! The outstanding was the Moon Bar & Vertigo (accompanied by smooth chillout music and a great wine selction!), the food was outrageously delicious, creatively presented and plentiful, all delivered with that 'Thai Smile' and knowledge of what they were serving and doing....and then there was the club lounge, the personalised service was just the right balance of personlised efficiency, mixed with a blend of politeness and good humour, nothing was too much trouble for anyone!
reviews.title: Perfectly Brilliant

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: Staff that were oustanding and deserve a mention include Surachai & his band of porters, Marisa and her club lounge staff particulary Elvis, and the staff from the Moon Bar and Vertigo. Cudos to the management in creating an exceptional destination for business or a weekend break...If I come back tomorrow its not soon enough!!
reviews.title: "Fantastic hotel"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled on business
reviews.text: The view from my room was fantastic especialy in the night....I love it.
reviews.title: Smell of heaven

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast at the restaurant was great all staff are very friendly and provide us very good service as always. I alway stay here and definitely com back again thank you.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a fantastic hotel. My only problem was that we only stayed two nights. From the initial welcome to our leaving we had a fabulous time. The staff were warm and welcoming, the room was large and extremely well appointed with everything a visitor would require. This hotel is a credit to their industry and l would recommend this hotel to any friend or family if they were staying in Bangkok.
reviews.title: Great Great Great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a club room on Agoda and it proved to be great value for money with the added extras ie canapes, cocktails in the evening and light refreshments throughout the day. The rooms are well designed with a huge bath in the window over looking the manic city below a great place to have a soak and a glass of wine while you relax. The staff were amazing nothing is too much trouble. The transfer from the airport was 50 mins and there is no need to hire a chauffeur from the hotel as it is so simple to pick up a taxi and it is considerably cheaper. I highly recChoose ommend this hotel even though earlier posts have said it is slightly off the main tourist route but the taxi fares are cheap so dont let this put you off.
reviews.title: Choose the club room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I recently stayed at the banjan tree Bangkok, one word 'amazing' . Beautiful hotel, excellent staff, first class room with a much appreciated aircom, I would not hesitate to recommend a stay there, we will be back, many thanks. Paul, uk.
reviews.title: First time in Bangkok
An oasis in this sleepless town
reviews.text: First, I would like to state, that we are not used to be guests of five star hotels and therefore I was not sure, what I can expect. But the stay was extraordinary and like I always imagined, a hotel stay should be: The room was perfect, other hotels would call it already a suite, as it had a living and a sleeping room. The bed was perfect, neither to soft or too hard, everything was perfectly clean and we had a stunning view over the town (from 55th and 58th floor). Only defects were, that in one room (in 55th floor) were some smaller things in the rooms furniture not in best shape (one hook for the towel was loose, the towel rail was a bit off position and two knobs on cabinets were a bit loose).

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed three nights through which we got excellent service, starting from the check-in, where we got a welcome drink and our bags were brought to our rooms, over the fresh fruits every day, the excellent breakfast buffet (western style, sushi and chinese food) and of course the pool (with sauna). One of us even got a birthday present as it happened, that she had her birthday during the stay!
reviews.title: Excellent but for one glitch

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: So we were booked in for the 2nd of Feb for 4 nights in the club king room. as soon as our Taxi arrived at the hotel our doors were opened by the concierge staff, and a lovely flower bracelet was put round our wrist, they took our name and whisked us up to floor 19 where we were greeting by beautiful smiles and a lovely refreshing drink, it all happened so fast they then showed us to our room. Club rooms are just beautiful, spacious and relaxing paying an extra couple of pounds is well worth it.
reviews.title: Amazing, I want to go back now!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Breakfast was amazing, so much to choose from, I was reading about the Banyan Tree Bangkok for months before our trip and heard a couple of reviews about how there wasn't enough choice at breakfast, these people must be blind as there was almost to much to choose from and if I had been greedy I would of gone home 2 stone Heavier. Beautiful Breakfast and again Service with beautiful Smiles.
reviews.title: Worth staying here for the excellent shopping companion service

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Club Lounge really couldn't do enough for us, they were always very helpful and I just want to say a massive thank you to all the staff, Hava I think her name was, was really helpful but so were all the others just unfortunately I have forgotten to write their names down.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Vertigo - MUST DO!!!!
reviews.title: An excellent hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled on business
reviews.text: We booked a table and we got the most amazing seats, the food was incredible and lots of it, we expected small portions but by the 3rd course i was bursting to the seams luckily i have a partner with a bottomless tummy to help :) It was so romantic, the only thing that spoilt it was a very loud young Australian behind us with a mouth like a potty, but the Hotel couldn't help that.£200 for a meal for 2 is a little on the pricey side but it's a very special place and a memory never forgotten. so worth it for me!
reviews.title: Great value in Bangkok
